channel.title: AudioNews UK - Daily News Digest
channel.description: Daily AI-enhanced news digest for visually impaired users. Professional Irish voice delivers concise summaries of UK news covering politics, economy, health, international affairs, climate, technology, and crime.
channel.itunes:author: Dynamic Devices
